name: Area 51 Defense (itch)
description:
The Game:

Area 51 Defense is an action-packed survival shooter, where you collect points and try to reach the highest score. The game is based on Hordelands editor / game, which is available for download here on Itch.io.

The Story:

The commander calls you at 4:00 AM and at 5:30 you are at Area 51, the secret air force installation. He explains tersely: "There are two million dweebs, nerds and geeks advancing in our direction. The hell of it is, you're the only one who can stop them!"

It's time to grab your firearm and strap your boots, soldier! Make Uncle Sam proud!

Features:
  • Blast the invading dweebs and gain points
  • Reach the highest score on the list
  • Shoot the gas bottles to create a trap for the invaders
  • Call in the air strike when things get really desperate
  • And ultimately, try to survive as long as you can!
Why Early Access?

This game is still in active development, and will be improved upon. We are committed to listen to player feedback and make the experience better with upcoming versions. The game is already playable, but we will make it truly epic along the way.

We will have more features such as local co-op, Steam achievements, trading cards and online high score board as we go along.

And above all, we open all the players to give us feedback on the game, and help us iron out the bugs in the game. Also new features suggested by the players will be added to the game!
